divs: Sighting DetailsWatering garden and taking pics of it looked up at sound of bird and sighted object. stopped and turned camera to video mode auto focus was still on and made it look further away than it was. it was traveling north.no contrails. no sound. solid mass. second sighting in 2 consecutive days. first sighting was while I was driving it was only visible for 5 seconds and it was headed northwest 7-01-08 kinda scary.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Jackson
There were no other sightings in Jackson on or around July 2nd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: white oblong like a hard eyeglass case
